ygData.subject: Re: hello out there
ygData.msgSnippet: ... that ... No I am running VooDoo 2 SLI in 1024x768.  I can t move the mouse to the right side or the bottom of the screen.  They have listed it as a problem
ygData.messageBody:
>
> Did you have the ati 4 meg video problem? They fixed that last week if
that
> was it.
> --

No I am running VooDoo 2 SLI in 1024x768. I can't move the mouse to the
right side or the bottom of the screen. They have listed it as a problem
and said it would be fixed. They said to switch the resolution to 800x600
for a temporary fix. The only problem is that the button to change it is
all the way on the right hand side of the screen. Oh well.

Mark
